Controls the physics aspect of the game.

Represents the in game HUD holding game related information

A model representing a game.
GameModel(float, float, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.spacecruiser.game.model.GameModel
Constructs a game with a space ship in a certain position and a certain number of asteroids in different sizes.
